short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily Bible Verse In Different Languages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Universal Bible is an extension where your new tab is replaced by an encouraging verse from the Holy Bible everyday that can be viewed in several languages including Spanish, Hindi, Portuguese, German, Chinese and many others, so that you stay connected with the Word of God in the language you speak. A search box powered by Bing.com enables you to browse the internet.

How to get started:
Universal Bible is a new tab extension which is integrated into Chrome to provide users access to a daily Bible verse in different languages and comes with a Bing.com search bar for your convenience. The new tab extension is easy to use and user-friendly and has a dropdown to change the language.
It does not store or share any personal information, financial details or authentication permissions.

Features:
A Bible verse daily on your New Tab with the option to view it in more than 10 international languages including German, Thai, Spanish etc.
Search box powered by Bing.com
Completely free to use and easy navigation

Permissions:
It  needs permission to allow new tabs to display the Universal Bible extension with the features including the access to the customised search bar powered by Bing.com. This extension does NOT ask for your login or password. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "Universal Bible" extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Uninstallation:
To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate "Universal Bible", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Remove Universal Bible?", click the Remove button.

Please refer to our Privacy Policy (https://poinsettiamedia.com/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://www.poinsettiamedia.com/terms/) or contact us at contact@poinsettiamedia.com for any queries.

Disclaimer: Universal Bible is an independent project and functions only as a new tab extension that has been created to ensure that verses from the Holy Bible can be viewed everyday in different languages. Please, refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on the purpose and methods of our handling user data.
